items.question: Do AI headshots meet CPA professional standards?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our templates are specifically designed for accounting professionals, ensuring conservative attire, appropriate expressions, and the trustworthy appearance that CPA firms require. The results consistently meet or exceed traditional photography standards.

items.question: How do you ensure consistency across our multi-office team?
items.answer: Our AI uses the same lighting, styling, and background templates for every team member, regardless of their location or when they upload photos. This guarantees perfect brand consistency that's impossible to achieve with multiple photographers.

items.question: Can we generate headshots during busy tax season?
items.answer: Yes! Team members upload photos individually on their own schedule - evenings, weekends, or breaks between client meetings. No group coordination required, and absolutely no disruption to billable hours or client deadlines.

items.question: What if a team member doesn't like their headshots?
items.answer: We include unlimited regenerations. If someone wants adjustments, they can upload different source photos or try alternative styling options at no extra cost. We guarantee satisfaction for every team member.

items.question: Are the images high enough quality for print materials?
items.answer: Yes. You receive both web-optimized and print-ready high-resolution files. They're perfect for business cards, firm brochures, office displays, website use, and any other professional materials your firm needs.

items.question: What volume discounts are available for larger accounting firms?
items.answer: We offer significant volume pricing for teams of 25+ people, with additional discounts for firms with 50+ and 100+ employees. Large firms can save up to 40% compared to individual pricing. Contact us for a custom enterprise quote with flexible billing terms.

items.question: How do you protect client confidentiality and data security?
items.answer: We understand the critical importance of confidentiality in accounting. All uploaded photos are encrypted, processed on secure servers, and permanently deleted after 30 days. We're SOC 2 compliant and maintain the same data security standards required for CPA firms handling sensitive financial information.

items.question: Do you offer enterprise billing and invoicing options?
items.answer: Yes. Large firms can pay via purchase order, net 30 terms, or centralized billing through accounts payable. We provide detailed invoices with cost center breakdowns and can accommodate your firm's specific procurement and billing requirements.
